channel.title: CVE Feed for bobbingwide -- oik
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bobbingwide -- oik

item.title: CVE-2024-43356|2024-08-27T13:07:22.537Z -- bobbingwide -- oik
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in bobbingwide.This issue affects oik: from n/a through 4.12.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-6391|2024-08-01T21:41:03.363Z -- bobbingwide -- oik
item.description: The oik plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's bw_button shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 4.10.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6391|2024-07-29T18:00:53.121Z -- bobbingwide -- oik
item.description: The oik plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's bw_button shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 4.10.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2256|2024-06-04T17:29:45.313Z -- bobbingwide -- oik
item.description: The oik plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcodes such as bw_contact_button and bw_button shortcodes in all versions up to, and including, 4.10.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
